/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of beige and gray, reflecting the urban landscape of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Cars and taxis are scattered along the street, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the city's lively atmosphere.
